columns.name: DeviceId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the device in the service

columns.name: SerialNumber
columns.description: Unique identifier for the certificate within a certificate authority's systems

columns.name: IssuedTo
columns.description: Entity that a certificate belongs to; can be a device, an individual, or an organization

columns.name: IssuedBy
columns.description: Entity that verified the information and signed the certificate

columns.name: FriendlyName
columns.description: Easy-to-understand version of a certificate's title

columns.name: SignatureAlgorithm
columns.description: Hashing algorithm and encryption algorithm used

columns.name: KeySize
columns.description: Size of the key used in the signature algorithm

columns.name: ExpirationDate
columns.description: The date and time beyond which the certificate is no longer valid

columns.name: IssueDate
columns.description: The earliest date and time when the certificate became valid

columns.name: SubjectType
columns.description: Indicates if the holder of the certificate is a CA or end entity

columns.name: KeyUsage
columns.description: The valid cryptographic uses of the certificate's public key

columns.name: ExtendedKeyUsage
columns.description: Other valid uses for the certificate
